cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.10)

# set the project name and version
project(sdl2core VERSION 1.0)

set(SDL2_PCKG_DIR  "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/../..")
list(APPEND EXTRA_INCLUDES "${SDL2_PCKG_DIR}/include")

# Base SDL
set(SDL_SHARED_ENABLED_BY_DEFAULT OFF)
set(SDL_TEST_ENABLED_BY_DEFAULT OFF)
add_subdirectory(sdl2base)
list(APPEND EXTRA_LIBS SDL2-static)
if (MSVC)
    list(APPEND EXTRA_LIBS SDL2::SDL2main)
endif()

# SDL Image
set(SDL2IMAGE_SHARED_LIBS OFF)
set(SDL2IMAGE_INSTALL OFF)
set(SDL2IMAGE_VENDORED ON)
add_subdirectory(sdl2image)
list(APPEND EXTRA_LIBS SDL2_image::SDL2_image-static)

# SDL TTF
set(SDL2TTF_SHARED_LIBS OFF)
set(SDL2TTF_INSTALL OFF)
set(SDL2TTF_VENDORED ON)
add_subdirectory(sdl2ttf)
list(APPEND EXTRA_LIBS SDL2_ttf::SDL2_ttf-static)

# SDL CODEC (Currently static only)
add_subdirectory(sdl2codec)
list(APPEND EXTRA_LIBS SDL2_codec::SDL2_codec-static)

add_library(sdl2core INTERFACE)
target_link_libraries(sdl2core INTERFACE ${EXTRA_LIBS})
